attributes.action: Form an agency to be known as the Anti seagull league to hunt and kill seagulls.
attributes.additional_details:
Seagulls are currently protected in the uk and this must change but not only this a whole new organisation must be formed to stop them https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/earth/wildlife/9533420/Seagulls-invade-cities-because-of-collapse-of-fishing-and-rise-in-recycling-food.html
https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/CDP-2017-0044/CDP-2017-0044.pdf&ved=2ahUKEwiLvov1sYrbAhUJI8AKHTStA5YQFjABegQIBhAB&usg=AOvVaw1-_V67pW175QHULTA-enss
attributes.background: For to long seagulls have terrorised citizens of this nation. For to long have holiday makers been forced to cower in fear as they enjoy their chips. For to long have we had to barricade ourselves indoors to enjoy our meals. It is time to fight back and create the Anti seagull league

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about seagulls, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to introduce specific measures to control the seagull population, if that's what you'd like to happen.
